evidence_example.title: event demo
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo that demonstrates how to work in MULTISTACK mode using Event, Alarms and counters. It runs under Lauterbach simulation environment.
evidence_example.long_descr: Event demo: A minimal EE demo that demonstrates how to work in MULTISTACK mode using Event, Alarms and counters. It runs under Lauterbach simulation environment.
